questions.question: Find the rank of the following matrix

explanations.a: It can't be 1 as the rows 1 and 2 are independent and row 3 is the sum of the first two rows
explanations.b: Rank of a matrix can't be 0
explanations.c: Excellent! Rank is two as there are two independent rows
explanations.d: Rank of a matrix can't be negative

questions.question: How many eigen values does the given matrix have?

explanations.d: Number of eigenvalues can't be greater than the matrix dimension

questions.question: Find the SVD of the given matrix A

explanations.b: The columns of U have the eigenvectors of AA', The columns of V have the eigenvectors of A'A and S is a diagonal matrix with singular values
explanations.c: The columns of U have the eigenvectors of AA', The columns of V have the eigenvectors of A'A and S is a diagonal matrix with singular values
explanations.d: The columns of U have the eigenvectors of AA', The columns of V have the eigenvectors of A'A and S is a diagonal matrix with singular values
